00021 #include "PointCloud3DIterator.h"

00023 namespace brics_3d {

00025 PointCloud3DIterator::PointCloud3DIterator() {
00026         currentTransformedPoint = 0;
00027         begin();
00028 }
00029 
00030 PointCloud3DIterator::~PointCloud3DIterator() {
00031 
00032 }
00033 
00034 void PointCloud3DIterator::begin() {
00035         index = 0;
00036         pointCloudsIterator = pointCloudsWithTransforms.begin();
00037 
00038         if ( !end() ) {
00039                 if (currentTransformedPoint) { //delete old copy
00040                         delete currentTransformedPoint;
00041                         currentTransformedPoint = 0;
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 /* cache the a transformed copy */
00045                 currentTransformedPoint = (*pointCloudsIterator->first->getPointCloud())[index].clone();
00046                 currentTransformedPoint->homogeneousTransformation(pointCloudsIterator->second.get());
00047         }
00048 }
00049 
00050 void PointCloud3DIterator::next() {
00051         ++index;
00052 
00053         if ( !end() ) {
00054                 if(index >= pointCloudsIterator->first->getSize()) { //wrap over - advance to next point cloud
00055                         index = 0;
00056                         pointCloudsIterator++;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 if ( !end() ) { // end could be reach meanwhile so we have to check again
00060                         if(false && pointCloudsIterator->second->isIdentity()) { // "lazyness" case
00061                                 /* cache the real data */
00062                                 currentTransformedPoint = &(*pointCloudsIterator->first->getPointCloud())[index];
00063                         } else {
00064                                 if (currentTransformedPoint) { //delete old copy
00065                                         delete currentTransformedPoint;
00066                                         currentTransformedPoint = 0;
00067                                 }
00068 
00069                                 /* cache the a transformed copy */
00070                                 currentTransformedPoint = (*pointCloudsIterator->first->getPointCloud())[index].clone();
00071                                 currentTransformedPoint->homogeneousTransformation(pointCloudsIterator->second.get());
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074         } else {
00075                 /* no further iterations, we are at the end */
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool PointCloud3DIterator::end() {
00080         if (pointCloudsIterator ==  pointCloudsWithTransforms.end()) {
00081                         return true;
00082         }
00083         return false;
00084 }
00085 
00086 Coordinate PointCloud3DIterator::getX() {
00087         return currentTransformedPoint->getX();
00088 }
00089 
00090 Coordinate PointCloud3DIterator::getY(){
00091         return currentTransformedPoint->getY();
00092 }
00093 
00094 Coordinate PointCloud3DIterator::getZ() {
00095         return currentTransformedPoint->getZ();
00096 }
00097 
00098 Point3D* PointCloud3DIterator::getRawData() {
00099         return &(*pointCloudsIterator->first->getPointCloud())[index];
00100 }
00101 
00102 void PointCloud3DIterator::insert(PointCloud3D::PointCloud3DPtr pointCloud, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr associatedTransform) {
00103 //void PointCloud3DIterator::insert(PointCloud3D* pointCloud, IHomogeneousMatrix44* associatedTransform) {
00104 
00105         pointCloudsWithTransforms.insert(std::make_pair(pointCloud, associatedTransform));
00106 }
